original_text: My Christian friends, each of you should continue as you were when God first called you to come to him. Remember that you serve God.
korean_text: 형제들아 너희는 각각 부르심을 받은 그대로 하나님과 함께 거하라

sentences.original_text: each of you should continue as you were
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 각자는 본래의 상태를 유지해야 한다

sentences.original_text: when God first called you to come to him
